kiwi_adamant_summary: Each time you <status>Immobilize</status> or <status>Ground</status> an enemy, gain Armor and Magic Resist.
kiwi_aram_sonicboom:
Buffing, Healing, or Shielding your ally deals @Damage@ true damage and Slows enemies surrounding them by @SlowAmount*-100@% for 2 seconds. (@ProcCooldown@s cooldown)

Total Damage Dealt to Champions: @f2@
kiwi_babykitty_name: I'm a Baby Kitty Where is Mama
kiwi_babykitty_summary:
Standing next to an ally marks them as your mama.
Gain Movement Speed when moving towards Mama. Gain Movement Speed and Heal and Shield Power when close to your mama.
kiwi_bigbrain_summary: Gain<shield> @ShieldBase@ Shield </shield>for every <scaleAP>%i:scaleAP% @AP@ Ability Power</scaleAP>. Refresh on death.
kiwi_biggestsnowballever_minionstun_desc: This unit is squished by Snowball
kiwi_biggestsnowballever_summary:
Gain @Haste@ Ability Haste on Snowball.

Your snowball is BIG and will pass through minions. It Slows, Knockups champions and deals additional damage.

If you don't have one, gain a Snowball.
kiwi_cheating_summary: Press Recall to return to base, buy items, and acquire augments.
kiwi_circleofdeath_summary: Healing and Health Regen you do also deal magic damage to the nearest enemy champion.
kiwi_criticalhealing_summary: Your <healing>Heals</healing> and <shield>Shields</shield> can Critically Strike for @CritHeal*100@% bonus amount. Gain %i:scaleCrit% @CritChance*100@% Crit Chance.
kiwi_criticalrhythm_summary: Gain @CritChance*100@% Crit Chance. Your basic attack stacks Attack Speed on Critical Strikes.
kiwi_cruelty_summary: On <status>Immobilizing</status> or <status>Grounding</status> a champion, summon a comet that lands after a delay, dealing <magicDamage>magic damage</magicDamage> in the area.
kiwi_dawnbringersresolve_summary:
Upon dropping below @HealthThreshold*100@% Health, heal for @HealAmount*100@% max Health over 3 seconds.
Refresh on death or every @Cooldown@ seconds.
kiwi_demonsdance_graspoftheundying: <titleLeft>Grasp Of The Undying</titleLeft><mainText>Your next attack on a champion will steal health.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
kiwi_divebomber_summary: Explodes when you die, dealing <trueDamage>massive damage true damage</trueDamage>.
kiwi_drawyoursword_summary: Become melee and gain <physicalDamage>Attack Damage</physicalDamage>, <healing>Health</healing>, <attackSpeed>Attack Speed</attackSpeed>, <lifesteal>Lifesteal</lifesteal>, and <speed>Move Speed</speed> (scaling with the range you give up.).
kiwi_dualwield_summary: Attacks fire a secondary bolt that applies {{ Item_Keyword_OnHit }} effects at reduced strength. Gain <attackSpeed>@AttackSpeed*100@% total Attack Speed</attackSpeed>.
kiwi_empyreanpromise_summary:
Gain %i:scaleHealShield% @HSAmp*100@% Heal and Shield power. Gain Empyrean Promise Summoner Spell.

Vigilance
Teleport to an ally and grant @ShieldAmount@ shield for @ShieldDuration@s after landing.
kiwi_erosion_debuff: This unit has lost Armor and Magic Resistance.
kiwi_escapeplan_summary: Gain a massive <shield>decaying Shield</shield>, decaying <speed>Movement Speed</speed>, and a decaying shrink effect upon reaching <scaleHealth>@HealthThreshold*100@% Health</scaleHealth>.
kiwi_etherealweapon_summary: Your Abilities apply {{ Item_Keyword_OnHit }} effects. 1 second cooldown per target.
kiwi_executioner_summary: Deal @BonusDamage*100@% more damage to enemies below @HealthThreshold*100@% health. Reset your basic abilities on takedown.
kiwi_fanthehammer_summary: Attacks fire @AdditionalBolts@ extra bolts that deal more damage with distance. Each direction has its own cooldown.
kiwi_fetch_summary:
Gain bonus Move Speed toward enemies marked by Snowball. You can pick up an ally's Snowball to refresh your own.

If you don't have one, gain a Snowball.
kiwi_finalform_buffbar: Gain a <shield>Shield</shield>, <lifeSteal>Omnivamp</lifeSteal> and <speed>bonus Movement Speed</speed> for @spell.Augment_FinalForm:AugDuration@ seconds. (@spell.Augment_FinalForm:Cooldown@s cooldown).
kiwi_finalform_summary: After casting your Ultimate, gain a <shield>Max Health Shield</shield>, <lifeSteal>Omnivamp</lifeSteal> and <speed>Movement Speed</speed> for @AugDuration@ seconds.
kiwi_flash2_summary: Gain a second Flash Summoner Spell and @SummonerHaste@ Summoner Haste.
kiwi_flashbang_summary: Flashing causes an explosion that damages and <status>slows</status>. Flash resets every death.
kiwi_frombeginningtoend_firststrike: <titleLeft>First Strike</titleLeft><mainText>Deal extra damage and gain gold based on the damage dealt when you start champion combat.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
kiwi_frombeginningtoend_firststrike_avai: <titleLeft>First Strike</titleLeft><mainText>Deal extra damage and gain gold based on the damage dealt when you start champion combat.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
kiwi_gash_summary: Deal True Damage %i:OnHit% <OnHit>On-Hit</OnHit>, scaling with your %i:scaleArmor% Armor.
kiwi_getexcited_buffbar: Gain <speed>@spell.Augment_ARAM_GetExcited:MSBuff*100@% decaying Movement Speed</speed> and <attackSpeed>@spell.Augment_ARAM_GetExcited:ASBuff*100@% Attack Speed</attackSpeed> for @spell.Augment_ARAM_GetExcited:BuffDuration@ seconds on takedown.
kiwi_getexcited_summary: Increase <speed>Move Speed</speed> and <attackSpeed>Attack Speed</attackSpeed> for @BuffDuration@ seconds on takedown.
kiwi_giantslayer_summary: Become tiny, gain <speed>Move Speed</speed>, and bonus damage to champions based on how much larger they are than you.
kiwi_glasscannon_summary: Reduce <scaleHealth>Max Health by @HPReductionPerc*100@%</scaleHealth>. Deal an extra @TrueDamagePerc*100@% damage as <trueDamage>True Damage</trueDamage>.
kiwi_goldrend_summary: Damaging a champion with Attacks or Abilities deals additional <magicDamage>magic damage</magicDamage>, grants you <gold>Gold</gold> and <speed>Move Speed</speed>.
kiwi_hatonahat_summary: Headwear items and hats give an extra <scaleAP>Ability Power</scaleAP>  and <scaleMR>Magic Resist</scaleMR>.
kiwi_homegaurd_summary: Gain <speed>@MovementSpeed*100@% Move Speed</speed>, disabled for @DisableCooldown@ seconds after taking damage.
kiwi_icecold_summary: Your <status>Slowing</status> effects reduce <speed>Move Speed</speed> by an extra @ExtraSlowAmount@.
kiwi_impassable_aftershockdelay: <titleLeft>Aftershock</titleLeft><mainText>This unit has increased resists and will deal damage to nearby units.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
kiwi_impassable_aftershockslowdebuff: <titleLeft>Aftershock</titleLeft><mainText>This units attack and Move Speed are slowed.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
kiwi_impassable_glacialaugment:
Glacial Augment
Your next immobilizing spell on a champion will create slowing zones around them.Source: @SourceName@
kiwi_impassable_glacialaugmentslow:
Glacial Augment
This unit has reduced Move Speed and deals reduced damage to enemy champions other than the one that slowed them.Source: @SourceName@
kiwi_infernalconduit_summary:
Your Abilities apply stacking Burn, that deals damage over time over time.

Your Burn effects reduce your basic Ability Cooldowns.
kiwi_keystoneconjurer_8214ally: <titleLeft>Summon Aery</titleLeft><mainText>This unit is shielded by Aery and will block some incoming damage.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
kiwi_keystoneconjurer_arcanecomet: <titleLeft>Arcane Comet</titleLeft><mainText>Your next spell will hurl a comet at the target champion.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
kiwi_keystoneconjurer_summonaery: <titleLeft>Summon Aery</titleLeft><mainText>Damage an enemy or target an ally with a spell to deploy Aery!</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
kiwi_laserheal_summary: Cast a healing laser for 2.5 seconds that <scaleHealth>heals allies</scaleHealth>, <status>slows</status> and deals <scaleAP>magic damage</scaleAP> to enemies.
kiwi_madscientist_summary: On each revive, you grow large (<font color = '#8347ff'>Adaptive Force</font> and <scaleHealth>Health</scaleHealth>) or tiny (Ability Haste and <speed>Move Speed</speed>).
kiwi_masterofduality_buffcounter: Your Attacks grant you stacking <scaleAP>Ability Power</scaleAP> and your Abilities grant you <scaleAD>Attack Damage</scaleAD>.
kiwi_masterofduality_summary: Your Attacks grant you stacking <scaleAP>Ability Power</scaleAP> and your Abilities grant you <scaleAD>Attack Damage</scaleAD>.
kiwi_mightyshield_summary: Gain %i:miniAdaptiveForce%<font color = '#8347ff'>@AdaptiveAmp@ Adaptive Force</font> for @ShieldDuration@ seconds when you gain a shield. (@Cooldown@s Cooldown)
kiwi_nightstalking_summary: Takedowns against enemy champions within @TakedownWindow@ seconds of damaging them renders you invisible.
kiwi_ominouspact_summary: Gain Ability Power, Move Speed and Omnivamp, based on missing Health, taking damage each time you cast.
kiwi_outlawsgrit_summary: After using a dash, blink, or teleport you gain <scaleArmor>@ResistsPerStack@ Armor</scaleArmor> and <scaleMR>Magic Resist</scaleMR> up to @MaxStacks@ stacks.
kiwi_poltergeist_summary:
Gain the Poltergeist Summoner Spell.

Poltergeist casts both Summoner Spell Barrier and Ghost.
kiwi_proteinshake_summary: Gain %i:scaleHealShield%@BonusHSPower@% <heal>Heal and Shield Power</heal> based on bonus <scaleArmor>Armor</scaleArmor> and <scaleMR>Magic Resistance</scaleMR>.
kiwi_quantumcomputing_summary: Periodically <keywordMajor>Autocast</keywordMajor> a massive slash. Enemies hit are <status>Slowed</status>, take additional <physicalDamage>max Health damage</physicalDamage>, and heal you.
kiwi_quest_sneakerhead_summary:
Immediate: Gain a random pair of upgraded boots.

Requirement: Complete its quest to swap for another.

Reward: Jarvan I's Boot
kiwi_quest_steelyourheart_summary:
Requirement: Possess Heartsteel with @StackThreshold@+ stacks.

Reward: Multiply your Heartsteel stacks by @StackMultiplication@.
kiwi_reenergize_summary: Your <keyword>Energized Attack</keyword> charges are fully refunded if the target is not the same as your previous. <keyword>Energized Attacks</keyword> deals extra <magicDamage>damage</magicDamage>.
kiwi_selfdestruct_summary: After exiting a hexgate, tunnel, or portal, attach a bomb to you. After @BombDelay@ seconds, it explodes fortrue damage and Knocks Up enemies.
kiwi_shadowrunner_summary: After using a dash, leap, blink, or teleport Ability or exiting <stealth>Stealth</stealth>, gain <speed>Move Speed</speed>.
kiwi_skilledsniper_summary: Hitting an enemy with a non-Ultimate Ability at far range refunds @ReducedCooldownPercent*100@% Cooldown (@PeriodicReductionAmount*100@% for periodic Abilities).
kiwi_slaparound_summary: Gain @AdaptiveForce@ Adaptive Force when you <status>Immobilize</status> or <status>Ground</status> an enemy. Lose @PercentOfStacksLost*100@% on death.
kiwi_snowballroulette_description:
Gain @AbilityHaste@ Ability Haste on Snowball. After dashing with Snowball, cast a random beneficial Summoner Spell on yourself or a harmful one on your target.

If you don't have one, gain a Snowball.
kiwi_snowballupgrade_summary:
Gain @AbilityHaste@ Ability Haste on Snowball. Hitting an enemy creates a snowfall that deals AoE damage and slows the area.

If you don't have one, gain a Snowball.
kiwi_spintowin_summary: Your spin Abilities gain @SpinHaste@ Ability Haste and deal @SpinDamageAmp*100@% more damage!
kiwi_spiritualpurification_summary: On takedown, creates an explosion that deals <scaleHealth>enemy's current health damage</scaleHealth> and <status>slows</status> them by @SlowAmount*100@%.
kiwi_swiftandsafe: Gain a <shield>shield</shield> after a dash or blink.
kiwi_symphonyofwar_conqueror: <titleLeft>Conqueror</titleLeft><mainText>This unit has additional Adaptive Force. At max stacks, heal based on damage dealt to champions</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
kiwi_symphonyofwar_lethaltempo:
Lethal Tempo
This unit gains ramping Attack Speed each time they attack an enemy champion, up to a max.

At the maximum, they gain 50 bonus attack range and increase the attack speed cap to 10.
Source: @SourceName@
kiwi_symphonyofwar_lethaltempo_buff: <titleLeft>Lethal Tempo</titleLeft><mainText>At max stacks, this unit gains 50 bonus atttack range and increases the attack speed cap to 10.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
kiwi_tankengine_summary: On takedown, gain a stack that increases size and <scaleHealth>max Health</scaleHealth>. Lose stacks on death.
kiwi_tapdancer_buffbar: This unit has bonus Movement Speed and Attack Speed
kiwi_tapdancer_summary: Your Attacks grant you <speed>Move Speed</speed>. Gain <attackSpeed>Attack Speed</attackSpeed> based on your Movement Speed.
kiwi_ultimateawakening_summary: Gain @AH@ Ultimate Ability Haste. After using your <keyword>Ultimate</keyword>, reset all your basic ability cooldowns. (@Cooldown@s Cooldown)
kiwi_ultimaterevolution_summary: Refresh your Ultimate Ability after casting it. (@Cooldown@s Cooldown or Reset on death)
kiwi_upgrade_collector_summary:
Executing enemies with The Collector's passive increase its execute threshold and grant bonus gold.
Gain 250 gold.
kiwi_upgrade_cutlass_summary:
Reduce Spectral Cutlass and Lifeline's cooldown to @UpgradeCD@s. When active, gain @DamageAmp*100@% damage amplification.

Gain 250 gold.
kiwi_upgrade_hubris_summary: Your Hubris now heals you on takedown and grants movement speed for the buff duration, both scaling with your stacks. Additionally, gain <gold>250 gold.</gold>
kiwi_upgrade_ie_summary:
Gain @CritChance*100@% %i:scaleCrit% Critical Strike Chance and 500 gold.
Having Infinity Edge allows your %i:scaleCrit% Critical Strike Chance to grant random %i:scaleCritMult% Critical Strike Damage each attack.
kiwi_upgrade_immolate_summary: <attention>Hollow Radiance</attention> and <attention>Sunfire Aegis</attention> grant <gold>@GoldPerTick@ gold</gold> per target affected with Immolate. Gain <gold>250 gold</gold>.
kiwi_upgrade_sheen_summary: Your <passive>Spellblade</passive> effects deal <physical>additional damage</physical> and <heal>heal</heal> you for a percent of the target's health. Additionally, gain <gold>250 gold</gold>.
kiwi_upgrade_zh_summary:
Reduce Zhonya's Hourglass cooldown to @UpgradeCD@s. You can now move when in Zhonya's Hourglass, Seeker's Armguard, or Wooglet's Witchcap stasis.

Gain 250 gold.
kiwi_upgrademichaelsblessing_summary:
Gain Mikael's Blessing. Reduce Mikael's Blessing Cooldown to @Cooldown@ seconds.

On item active, cleanse Disabling and Immobilizing effects and Heal allies in range.
kiwi_vampirism_summary: You cannot be Healed by allies or gain any <healing>Health Regen</healing>. Gain <omnivamp>@OmniVamp*100@%</omnivamp> Omnivamp.
kiwi_veilofwarding_summary: Gain a <attention>Spell Shield</attention> every @Cooldown@ seconds that blocks the next enemy Ability.
kiwi_windbeneathblade_summary: The higher your <physicalDamage>Armor Penetration</physicalDamage> and <magicDamage>Magic Penetration</magicDamage> are, the faster you are.
kiwi_windspeakerblessing_buff: This unit has increased <scaleArmor>Armor</scaleArmor> and <scaleMR>Magic Resist</scaleMR>.
ornnitemupgrademodifier_rabbitdons_flavo: <section><flavorText>"Friend." Yes, it is a funny word. Yet perhaps I understand its purpose. </flavorText></section>
upgradecutlassaugmentitemupgrademodifier:
Upgraded Soul Anchor
Soul Anchor has reduced cooldown and grants @f1@% damage amplification when active.
upgradehubrisaugmentitemupgrademodifier:
Upgraded Eminence
Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them additionally heals 2.5% of your max health plus @f3*100@% missing health and grants @f4@ Move Speed scaling with your stacks.
upgradeieaugmentitemupgrademodifier:
Upgrade: Excoriate
Each Critical strike deals random bonus Critical Strike Damage, scaling up to @f4*100@% of your Critical Strike Chance.
upgradeimmolateaugmentitemupgrademodifie:
Upgraded Immolate
Now grants @f5@ gold per target affected with Immolate.
upgrademikaelsblessingaugmentitemupgrade:
Upgraded Purify
Reduce Mikael's Blessing Cooldown to @f2@ seconds.
On activate, cleansing Disabling and Immobilizing effects, restoring @f1@ Health, and granting 65% Tenacity for 3 seconds.
upgradesheenaugmentitemupgrademodifier:
Upgraded Spellblade {{ Item_Cooldown }}
After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with additional max Health physical damage and healing for @f5*100@% of the premitigation damage.
upgradesheenlbaugmentitemupgrademodifier:
Upgraded Spellblade {{ Item_Cooldown }}
After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with additional max Health magic damage and healing for @f5*100@% of the target's maximum health.
upgradezhaugmentitemupgrademodifier:
Upgraded Time Stop
This cooldown is reduced and you can now move while under Stasis.
